repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: Committee of Industrial Relations Librarians (CIRL) Records
did.abstract: Administrative records consist of memoranda, correspondence, minutes and reports pertaining to the Committee's annual conferences (1947-1982) and memoranda, notes and letters concerning classification systems, retention policies, subject headings, research and education, exhibits, reference services and membership.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183> kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Committee serves as a forum for an exchange of ideas and information, and engages in cooperative projects designed to improve the usefulness of materials in the industrial and labor relations field.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Administrative records consist of memoranda, correspondence, minutes and reports pertaining to the Committee's annual conferences (1947-1982) and memoranda, notes and letters concerning classification systems, retention policies, subject headings, research and education, exhibits, reference services and membership.

Also catalog cards, photographs of meetings, exhibit materials, chronologies of the Committee (1947-1972), newsletters (1968-1978), directories of industrial relations programs in North America (1961-1972), and copies of INDUSTRIAL RELATIONS THESES AND DISSERTATIONS: A COMPILATION SPONSORED BY THE COMMITTEE OF UNIVERSITY INDUSTRIAL RELATIONS LIBRARIANS (1951-1972). Includes tape recordings of 1971 and 1975 meetings.

Additionally, documentation of the Subject Headings Subcommittee's projects to establish a thesaurus of standardized industrial and labor relations subject terms. Include copies and revisions of A STANDARDIZED LIST OF SUBJECT HEADINGS IN INDUSTRIAL RELATIONS (1963-1968), and memoranda, reports, notes and correspondence of Subcommittee members concerning subject terms and the agenda of meetings (1949-1968).

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Committee of Industrial Relations Librarians (CIRL) Records #5171. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
